description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The ants are leaving the old anthills to create new colonies, but the queens are not happy and will try to get the ants back. Place arrows to direct the ants to your colony and to avoid the queens, the player with most ants at the end of the round wins.
description.short: The ants are leaving the old anthills to create new colonies, but the queens are not happy and will try to get the ants back. Place arrows to direct the ants to your colony and to avoid the queens, the player with most ants at the end of the round wins.
